title: Food Bank Sunday
description: Please bring non-perishable food items to donate to the local food bank. Items can be placed in the donation box in the foyer.

title: Grief Share
description: Meeting Saturdays at Florence-Carlton church. Group discussion will follow each free session. Each session includes a short video featuring interviews with grief recovery experts and real-life stories of people who have experienced the death of a loved one. Contact the church office for more information.

title: Stand Firm Apologetics Seminar
description: This free seminar equips believers to give a reason for their faith. It helps adults and children alike discern the messages of the world. Lunch and childcare are provided. See Karen Moore for more information or to sign up. Informational flyers are in the foyer.

title: Bitterroot Valley Ladies Retreat
description: Join the retreat at Big Sky Bible Camp in Big Fork, MT. Find more information and a registration form on the bulletin board in the foyer.

title: Bitterroot Living Center Ministry
description: Our church will be hosting a worship service at BVLC. This is a wonderful opportunity to minister to the residents by visiting, holding bibles and song books, and encouraging them in the Lord.

title: Nursery and 3-K Sunday School Meeting
description: This is the last chance for all volunteers to attend a meeting in the 3-K Classroom. Please let Heather Mapledoram know if you cannot attend.

title: Baby Shower for Spann & Tybur Families
description: A baby shower for Meaghan & Matt Spann (expecting a boy) and Cole & Selena Tybur. Spanns need diapers & wipes, Tyburs need burp cloths, socks, onesies, gowns & clothes. Dessert will be served.

title: Bridal Shower for Cadence Brown
description: Join us for food, fellowship, and showering Cadence & Reuben with gifts for their new life together. They are registered on Amazon and Target. Bring a wedding photo (optional).

title: Life Chain
description: Annual pro-life event hosted by Pro-Life Bitterroot. Participants will line 1st Street in Hamilton in prayer against abortion. For this hour, people will gather to express their support for the sanctity of life. If you plan to attend, please put your name on the sign-up sheet in the foyer. For more information, contact Dianne Orton.
